title: 04/12/2021 - HOUR 1 - Rodgers, NBA, Durant
itunes:title: 04/12/2021 - HOUR 1 - Rodgers, NBA, Durant
description:
Some athletes like Aaron Rodgers are addicted to chaos

The Clippers showed us how important chemistry is

Kevin Durant cares more about winning championships than he claims


Guest: Albert Breer
